tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE adult_learners (
    learner_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name STRING,
    last_name STRING,
    age INT,
    gender STRING,
    education_level STRING,
    preferred_learning_mode STRING
);

CREATE TABLE adult_learners_demographics (
    learner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name STRING,
    last_name STRING,
    age INT,
    gender STRING,
    education_level STRING
);

CREATE TABLE adults_demographics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    education_level VARCHAR,
    occupation VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE learning_preferences (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    learner_id INT,
    preferred_modality VARCHAR,
    preferred_topic VARCHAR,
    preferred_duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE program_feedback (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    learner_id INT,
    satisfaction_rating INT,
    improvement_suggestions TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE adult_learners_demographics (
    learner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    education_level VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE learning_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    learner_id INT,
    preferred_learning_mode VARCHAR(50),
    preferred_subject VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE program_improvement (
    improvement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(100),
    improvement_area VARCHAR(100),
    suggested_actions TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE learner_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    learner_id INT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    feedback_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE adult_learners_demographics (
    learner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    ethnicity VARCHAR,
    education_level VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE learning_preferences (
    learner_id INT,
    learning_style VARCHAR,
    preferred_time VARCHAR,
    preferred_subject VARCHAR,
    PRIMARY KEY (learner_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (learner_id) REFERENCES adult_learners_demographics (learner_id)
)

CREATE TABLE program_improvement (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    improvement_suggestions TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE assessments (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    learner_id INT,
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessment_score FLOAT,
    assessment_feedback TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (learner_id) REFERENCES adult_learners_demographics (learner_id)
)

CREATE TABLE enrollment (
    enrollment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    learner_id INT,
    program_id INT,
    enrollment_date DATE,
    enrollment_status VARCHAR,
    FOREIGN KEY (learner_id) REFERENCES adult_learners_demographics (learner_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES program_improvement (program_id)
)
